queries.name: DLT-retail-data-quality-stats
queries.query:
select 
    date(timestamp) day, sum(failed_records)/sum(output_records)*100 failure_rate, sum(output_records) output_records from dbdemos_c360.dlt_expectations 
group by day order by day

queries.name: DLT-retail-data-quality
queries.query:
select sum(passed_records) as passed_records,
       sum(failed_records) as failed_records,
       sum(dropped_records) as dropped_records,
       sum(output_records) as output_records,
       sum(failed_records)/sum(output_records)*100 as failure_rate,
       name,
       dataset,
        date(timestamp) as date from dbdemos_c360.dlt_expectations values group by date, dataset, name;

queries.name: DLT-retail-data-quality-per-table
queries.query:
select 'passed_records' as type,
       sum(passed_records) as value, 
       sum(failed_records)/sum(output_records)*100 as failure_rate,
       dataset 
   from field_demos_retail.dlt_expectations  group by dataset
union
select 'failed_records' as type,
       sum(failed_records) as value, 
       sum(failed_records)/sum(output_records)*100 as failure_rate,
       dataset 
   from field_demos_retail.dlt_expectations  group by dataset
union
select 'dropped_records' as type,
       sum(dropped_records) as value, 
       sum(failed_records)/sum(output_records)*100 as failure_rate,
       dataset 
   from dbdemos_c360.dlt_expectations  group by dataset

widgets.text:
# Retail ingestion quality tracker
This dashboard leverage the Delta Live Table expectation metrics to track our data quality over the ingestion pipeline.

The pipeline is incrementally consuming new data (each hour or in real time) and the dashboard is updated accordingly. Open notebook `02.1-Delta-Live-Table-Ingestion` to visualize the Delta Live Table pipeline.

Data has been prepared using a SQL query over the value from the `/system/events` table. Open `02.3-DLT-expectation-dashboard-data-prep` for more details.

query.name: DLT-retail-data-quality-stats
query.query:
select 
    date(timestamp) day, sum(failed_records)/sum(output_records)*100 failure_rate, sum(output_records) output_records from dbdemos_c360.dlt_expectations 
group by day order by day

query.query:
select sum(passed_records) as passed_records,
       sum(failed_records) as failed_records,
       sum(dropped_records) as dropped_records,
       sum(output_records) as output_records,
       sum(failed_records)/sum(output_records)*100 as failure_rate,
       name,
       dataset,
        date(timestamp) as date from dbdemos_c360.dlt_expectations values group by date, dataset, name;

group by day order by day

union
select 'failed_records' as type,
       sum(failed_records) as value, 
       sum(failed_records)/sum(output_records)*100 as failure_rate,
       dataset 
   from field_demos_retail.dlt_expectations  group by dataset
union
select 'dropped_records' as type,
       sum(dropped_records) as value, 
       sum(failed_records)/sum(output_records)*100 as failure_rate,
       dataset 
   from dbdemos_c360.dlt_expectations  group by dataset
